Background Blend Mode

# Background Blend Mode

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                        | Support        |
| ---------------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
bg-blend-normal
```      | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-multiply
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-screen
```      | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-overlay
```     | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-darken
```      | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-lighten
```     | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-color-dodge
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-color-burn
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-hard-light
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-soft-light
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-difference
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-exclusion
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-hue
```         | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-saturation
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-color
```       | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
bg-blend-luminosity
```  | ✅ Full Support |
